channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Tennis courts flooded - cleaning needed, 14th February
item.description:
The tennis courts in Vauxhall park are flooded and can’t be used. Cleaning of the surface will improve drainage through the layers. This has been shown to work in the last - pressure wash required.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Fentiman Road, Vauxhall, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large pile of black bags and boxes on April Street E8, 14th February
item.description:
Hello, please can you remove the large pile of rubbish and black bags and boxes on April street E8 This is also blocking the pavement and is a tripping hazard. Thank you

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): April Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Sainsbury’s trolleys abandoned outside store, 14th February
item.description:
Sainsbury’s now abandon their trolleys outside the store. Preventing people from using the footpath and accessing the ATM and causing the area to look a mess. Please sort.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 83-89, Queen's Road, Peckham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Black bins not collected on thursday, 14th February
item.description:
The black bins were draggeed onto the road as usual first thing on Thursday then they forgot to come and empty them. so rubbish bags have been left for the foxes to open and parking spaces have been blocked.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Hertford Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Large potholes in this very busy road, 14th February
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 7, Chislehurst Road, Longlands, Sidcup, Greater London

item.title: Wrong penalty charge, 14th February
item.description:
I am the driver of a Mercedes Benz car who received a fine for dropping off a customer at the address on Barnabas Road JCT Oriel Road at 20.19 on 06/02/2026 please tell me what solution you have for the entry and exit of taxis or Uber cars ?
Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Oriel Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Dead Dog, 14th February
item.description:

item.title: A row of deep potholes, 14th February
item.description:
There’s a pothole here that has been getting bigger and bigger the last few weeks. It is just before and after the speed bump near 120/122 Churchdown just after the current works that are being done. It is a very large pothole and if it doesn’t get fixed I can see this causing damage to vehicles coming down this road
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Churchdown, Downham, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Broken glass and dangerous burnt out structure, 14th February
item.description:
There is broken glass in the playground/skate ramp area which is incredibly dangerous for children. The skate ramp has been burnt out and abandoned since November. It needs to be cleared and rebuilt for safe use.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Radial Path, East Wickham, Greater London
